mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT V.ID, V.MEMBER_ID, V.POST_TITLE, V.POST_SUBTITLE, V.POST_CONTENT, V.POST_CATEGORY, V.POST_VIEW_COUNT, V.POST_WRITE_TIME, V.VIDEO_LINK, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(L.POST_ID) FROM TBL_POST_LIKE L WHERE L.POST_ID = V.ID) AS LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(R.POST_ID) FROM TBL_POST_REPLY R WHERE R.POST_ID = V.ID) AS REPLY_COUNT, (SELECT F.FILE_NAME FROM TBL_POST_FILE F WHERE F.POST_ID = V.ID AND F.ID = (SELECT MIN(ID) FROM TBL_POST_FILE WHERE POST_ID = V.ID)) AS FILE_NAME, (SELECT F.FILE_PATH FROM TBL_POST_FILE F WHERE F.POST_ID = V.ID AND F.ID = (SELECT MIN(ID) FROM TBL_POST_FILE WHERE POST_ID = V.ID)) AS FILE_PATH FROM VIEW_VIDEO_POST V JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON V.MEMBER_ID = M.ID WHERE V.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY V.POST_WRITE_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT P2.ID, P2.MEMBER_ID, P2.POST_TITLE, P2.POST_CONTENT, P2.POST_CATEGORY, P2.POST_VIEW_COUNT, P2.POST_WRITE_TIME, P2.VIDEO_LINK, P2.MEMBER_NICKNAME, P2.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, P2.MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME, P2.MEMBER_PROFILE_PATH, P2.LIKE_COUNT, P2.REPLY_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P1.* FROM (SELECT V.ID, V.MEMBER_ID, V.POST_TITLE, V.POST_CONTENT, V.POST_CATEGORY, V.POST_VIEW_COUNT, V.POST_WRITE_TIME, V.VIDEO_LINK, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_NAME, M.MEMBER_PROFILE_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(L.POST_ID) FROM TBL_POST_LIKE L WHERE L.POST_ID = V.ID) AS LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(R.POST_ID) FROM TBL_POST_REPLY R WHERE R.POST_ID = V.ID) AS REPLY_COUNT FROM VIEW_VIDEO_POST V JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON V.MEMBER_ID = M.ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY V.POST_WRITE_TIME DESC) P1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pagination.endRow}) P2 WHERE R >= #{pagination.startRow}
